title: FAVICON symbol for webpage
snippet:
Hello, 

We need a FAVICON 16x16 px for our web page in png format. We have this logo in PNG but simply need the first letter (symbol) extracted from the main logo in the original resolution. I can then reduce the size to 16x16 px. It must have a transparent background. Please let me know if you can do this and how much it will cost :-)

Thanks,
Rob
